Name: Drekirokr - Dusk of the Dragon
About the game: Millions of years after a devastating incident in a world similar to ours, humanity strives for survival against the planet's own evolution. Explore the dimensions and the continuums of time and space in this hybrid of fantasy and sci-fi. Fight with magic, swords and knowledge. Explore and understand, discover the real face of the world. Features An epic adventure with lots of places to explore and interact! SNES/GBA styled low-res graphics. Fight against hordes of enemies in tactical battles! A lively world! Simulation of time passing, that influences most places! And best of all, forever free!
